cells.data:
## Insert ES2

The insert came from PCR CM019, sample 3. Straight from PCR, there is some smearing. The concentration was 137 ng/ul. See [PCR CM019](quiver-note-url/D1ACE114-1607-457C-ABD2-F8CDADB401FE).  

## Construct

Construct is the Emilia ES2 construct from Augusto digested by Bam-HF and NotI-HF. The concentration of the tube was 74 ng ul.

## Reaction

| reagent | ul   |
|---------|------|
| insert  | 2.5  | 
|construct| 1    |
| Gibson  | 5    | 
| water   | 1.5  |

Grown in Carb LB at 30c for 30 hours. 

## Colonies
